name: Memories of Glass Maiden
description:
The story and worldview of ‘GLASS' is a visual novel game that you can enjoy comfortably

- Game Features

In this game, you will uncover the secrets of the 'Glass World' and the memories of the 'Glass Maiden' through interactions with the female protagonists who have been dragged into the glass world.

Attack each Glass Maiden's weaknesses to lead her to climax and explore her memories.

This game is a package for fans who want to comfortably enjoy the world view and story of Yuri World.
(There may be some overlap with the existing GLASS 2. Therefore, users who purchased GLASS 2 do not need to purchase this game now. We recommend purchasing it after future content updates.)

This package will continue to update visual novel content from the Yuri World universe that is not provided in the game.
